Package com.w10.risk_game.commands

Class Blockade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w10.risk_game.commands.Order
      • com.w10.risk_game.commands.Blockade
  • public class Blockade
extends Order
    The Blockade class represents a blockade order in a game, where a player blocks a country and triples its army count while removing it from their owned countries.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean CheckValidBlockadeInput​(String[] p_inputArray)
      This function is used to check the input format for blockade command.
      void execute()
      The function executes a block action on a country, tripling its army count, removing its owner, and updating the player's list of owned countries.
      static Country GetCountryToBlock​(Player p_player, String p_countryId)
      The function checks if a provided country ID is valid and belongs to a player, and returns the corresponding Country object if it exists.
      static boolean ValidateOrder​(Player p_player, String p_countryId)
      The function checks if a player can block a specific country in a game.

        public Blockade​(Player p_player,

        Constructor for Blockade class.
        Parameters:
        p_player - The player who is issuing the order.
        p_countryId - The country id of the country to set up blockade.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        The function executes a block action on a country, tripling its army count, removing its owner, and updating the player's list of owned countries.
        Specified by:
        execute in class Order

      • ValidateOrder

        public static boolean ValidateOrder​(Player p_player,
                                    String p_countryId)
        The function checks if a player can block a specific country in a game.
        Parameters:
        p_player - The player object that represents the player making the order.
        p_countryId - The p_countryId parameter is a String that represents the ID of a country.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a boolean value.

      • GetCountryToBlock

        public static Country GetCountryToBlock​(Player p_player,
                                        String p_countryId)
        The function checks if a provided country ID is valid and belongs to a player, and returns the corresponding Country object if it exists.
        Parameters:
        p_player - The player object that represents the player who wants to block a country.
        p_countryId - The country ID that needs to be checked and blocked.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a Country object.

      • CheckValidBlockadeInput

        public static boolean CheckValidBlockadeInput​(String[] p_inputArray)
        This function is used to check the input format for blockade command.
        Parameters:
        p_inputArray - the input string split by space
        Returns:
        boolean value to show whether the input format is valid
